attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep myself informed about the 2020 campaign. However this app completely glitches out and my phone doesn’t work properly anymore. Might as well not download and I would advise the developers to delete immediately before other phones are destroyed. Furthermore my phone is still traumatized from the fact that it had a trump app on it🤮🤮🤮.
attributes.title: RUINED MY PHONE

attributes.review: as soon as I downloaded the app my dog blew up into a million (the way trump pronounces it) pieces. also was immediately asked for nudes but I am 17 years old. truly awful, my ears started ringing and I threw up fifteen times as a result of the download. do not recommend, please be safe and wear a mask and wash your hands after touching this app. the corona from the multiple rallies he held without proper precautions will spread through the screen.
attributes.userName: b u n k e r b o y
attributes.title: sad.

attributes.review:
I opened the just to be disgusted by the sight of what appeared to be a naked mole rat in a powdery wig?! I tried to delete the app but every time it would move out from under my finger! After I gave up I went to sleep and awoke the next morning to find that my fridge and microwave had been stolen!!!! As another user complained, the app had stolen my kitchen appliances! How am I supposed to eat lukewarm mayonnaise now?

-concerned mayonnaise consumer
attributes.title: JUST AWFUL

attributes.review: This app has hurt me physically and emotionally, I just don’t want anyone else to have to go through what this app has put ME through. Stay away from this application. It’s infectious, subliminal messages sneak into your head and all of a sudden you’re shouting “Donald trump is a sexy man beast and he eats children for supper”. Please, I beg you, choose a different app to download.
attributes.title: please for the love of god remove this app off the face of the earth

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and then we i when on it it immediately got access to my photos and camera and I was mad but didn’t think about now I left the app and it immediately deleted all my games and my phone was glitch out I expected better from this app 😡😡 and i just was gonna try it out now I have to download all my stuff again😡😡😡😣😔
attributes.title: Horrible app ever

attributes.review:
so i had this pet frog for more than 2 years. i have had it since it was a little egg. when i started supporting trump and his ways, MY FROG RAN AWAY! my sweet frog left me a note saying “i have to leave you luv, you download a rapist/perverts app and that is just not radical of you so i had to leave you. i will return once you fix your self. xoxo frog” 
GUSS WHAT the DAY i stoped supporting trump my sweet frog returned home to me. so DO NOT GET THIS APP! 😡🐸🤬
attributes.title: Made my frog run away

attributes.review: this app dragged my best friend to the hair salon and cut off all her hair to donate it to that bald wack Oompa Loompa Orange Cheeto puff😿😿. Then it punched her grandma, stole her dog and broke her nose. Worst app ever, do NOT recommend😾😾. When i downloaded it, my phone literally tried to commit not alive because of the toxins the app radiated within its body🙀🙀. For the sake of your phone’s health and physical wellbeing, please keep this virus away from them. I’m very disappointed in this app. 😾😾🤜🏻👊🏻
attributes.title: hold ❣️me Neer 🥖 b4 we pee 😌✨

attributes.review: This app sucked!!! Every time I get on it it malfunctions and takes me out at first I thought it was my phone so I went to try to get it fixed they said nothing was wrong with my phone but the app could be faulty! Then I kept the app because it started to work a little bit then I kept getting spam emails which I think were attached to viruses. Worst app ever!
attributes.title: Kept malfunctioning

attributes.review: i opened the app and it stole my credit card info and i didn’t even put it in???👁👄👁 disgusting don’t get this app it steals your information and puts it out so people hack your accounts and the glitches are even worse. i want to throw up everytime i see this app. instead Look 👀 for 4️⃣ the 💁‍♀️gummy 😽 bear 🐻 album ✒️in 🎈 stores 🏬 on 🚘 November 🏗 13th 🥨 with 🍠 lots 🌪 of 🐉 music 🎶 videos 📢 and ➕ extras 💰
attributes.title: yeah no❤️

attributes.review: This app is just terrible it’s so slow and as soon as I downloaded it my phone began to glitch. I couldn’t even use my phone for about an hour because it wouldn’t work properly. Then when I went to uninstall the app it wouldn’t leave my phone. This app is horrible and represents an even worse person who is a horrible president.
attributes.title: 100% would NOT recommend
